entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm: Revisit ClassLayout::GetRegisterType() #59290
  • NotSupportedException at at System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC.HashFinal() #59289
  • [API Proposal]: add a setter to TransactionManager.MaximumTimeout #59282
  • [wasm] Publish deletes *build* intermediate files, causing relinking on incremental build #59278
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding ArgumentEmptyException #59273
  • .NET 6.0 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #59272
  • Post-6.0 infrastructure improvements #59271
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add overloads to support IAsyncEnumerable with source-gen #59268
    7.0.0
  • FilteredByLevel_InsideScope benchmark has regressed #59267
  • MutualThdRecur-fptr.sh failed with NullReferenceException on Ubuntu #59260
  • Wasm native dependencies: [DllImport] in own source code doesn't work #59255
    6.0.0
  • Convering `DateOnly/TimeOnly` from string #59253
  • Missing tag/release for 5.0.10 #59250
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 2, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 2 #runtime-109158-.NET6RC2 #59241
  • System.TypeLoadException : Type 'System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection' does not inherit from 'System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler' #59239

Closed

  • Attempting to JIT compile method in System.Text.Json tests on iOS devices #58204
    7.0.0
  • Enum.ToUInt64() performance improvement #59248
  • Potential perf regression in Utf8Encoding.GetBytes #59146
  • .NET 5.0 - ShortDatePattern for the culture nl-NL has changed #59251
  • WebSocket UTF8 output validation doesn't throw #59214
    7.0.0
  • Is the breaking change in PipeWriterStream.WriteAsync intentional? #59209
  • System.Drawing.Common is no longer usable from < netcoreapp3.1 projects #59032
    6.0.0
  • Running a .NET 5 project on macOS M1 with .NET 6 leads to confusing error message #59168
  • INT64 size array support in c# #59245
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync hits assert when loop body throws OperationCanceledException #58981
    6.0.0
  • The behavior of the BufferBlock<T>.Fault method appears to be inconsistent #59197

PullRequests

Created

  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: update debug dumping for loop hoisting #59287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1369634 #59286
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Work around for forbidden "Roslyn4.0" in test name on Android #59281
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Bump sdk version for workload testing to 6.0.100-rc.2.21467.10 #59279
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update xunit version on release branch #59277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • Update xunit version on dotnet/runtime #59275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove some unnecessary allocations / copies on startup #59270
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59269
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cleanup defines in System.Linq.Expressions #59266
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • Cleanup defines in DirectoryServices.AccountManager #59265
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [interp] Add wide data item index static load and stores #59262
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [interp] Disable optimization if the var index is greater than G_MAXUINT16 #59261
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Create and publish missing symbols #59259
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #59258
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • Fix invalid parsing of not unicode Uri #59252
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • EmccCompile: reduce allowedParallelism by 1, to account for the implicit core #59244
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update source-gen APIs according to review #59243
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59238
    area-codeflow

Merged

  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Get rid of ModuleDesc.GetTypeResolutionFailure #59249
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove some of the restrictions on constrained calls from #59182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Implement UriCreationOptions #59274
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Logging Source Generator to handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Work around for forbidden "Roslyn4.0" in test name on Android #59263
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Only set path in x64 mac installer when installing on x64 #59210
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [interp] Add wide data item index static load and stores #59220
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove mostly unused SafeFileHandleHelper.Unix class #59254
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • update crossfs for FreeBSD 12.2 #59240
    os-freebsd, area-Infrastructure
  • [interp] Disable optimization if the var index is greater than G_MAXUINT16 #59225
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59237
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/6.0] Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59194
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.0
  • [docs] Add instructions for debugging native runtime code on Android #59183
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Bump RC2 intellisense version #59223
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • File.Unix: save a syscall on the File.{Write*,Append*} methods. #59247
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59172
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • FreeBSD fix for AF_UNIX IPC socket permission #58688
    os-freebsd, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59231
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Setup retry for System.Net.* tests #57370
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Refactor subrange assertion generation and propagation #55186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59205
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [MONO][WASM] Changed wasmapp.LocalBuild.props to use net6.0 #59213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • [HTTP/3] Fix NullReferenceException on Timeout when streaming request body #59204
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Experiment with compressing individual method contexts #59000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run disabled tests on windows #52672
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
